entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect description when update dotnet tool with prerelease version #25486
  • .NET 6.0.5 Patch - SDK Update necessary? #25478

Closed

  • Fix package signature verification when installing workloads. #25377
    6.0.3xx
  • Workload feature band fallback doesn't work with workload update #23403
    6.0.4xx

PullRequests

Created

  • document long paths-related error message when building on windows #25490
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clear DOTNET_ROOT_arch environment variable #25480
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #25479
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.0 to the current framework #25476
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Enable the 4.8.1 target in sdk style projects #25393
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Feature band fallback with workload update #24678
    Area-Workloads
  • Remove duplicated PackageReference #25443
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #25467
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1776107 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cache pipeline inputs when suppressed: #24928
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Support suppressing transitive framework reference downloads, and other changes #25358
  • add tests to cover the resolution of AnalysisLevel known-strings #25454
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22233
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the hardcoded netcoreapp1.1 to the current framework #25350
    Area-Infrastructure
